events.message: Received application from candidate John Doe for the Software Engineer position, including resume and cover letter highlighting relevant experience.
Categorised John Doe's application under Engineering after confirming the role is Software Engineer and skills match development requirements.
Assigned recruiter Emily Smith to manage John's application to ensure smooth communication and timely follow-up through the process.
Conducted initial phone screening with John to discuss his experience in software development, problem-solving skills, and career goals.
Received positive response from John confirming his availability and enthusiasm to proceed with the technical interview.
Scheduled technical interview for John with the Engineering team on May 5th to assess coding skills and system design capabilities.
